parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns limits, as an [[Array]] [min, max] of <tt>CT_SLIDER</tt> or <tt>CT_XSLIDER</tt> with given idc of topmost user [[dialog]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sliderRange''' idc
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [min, max]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''sliderRange''' control

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - [min, max]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_slidelimits1 = [[sliderRange]] 105;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[sliderPosition]], [[sliderSetPosition]], [[sliderSetRange]], [[sliderSetSpeed]], [[sliderSpeed]]
</value></part></template>
